scripts.postinstall: (cd ignite-gpt-app && npm install) & (cd electron-react-boilerplate && npm install)
scripts.start:web: cd ignite-gpt-app && BROWSER=false npm run web
scripts.start:desktop: npm run desktop:apply && trap 'cd electron-react-boilerplate && git reset --hard' INT TERM && (cd electron-react-boilerplate && npm run start)
